div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1729 Toukh el Garmous, 20 km. NE of (1123) Zagazig, 1905 Burial: 3rd-1st cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: AR. Found in chamber 2 of temple treasury (cf. nos. 1679, 1680 above) Ptolemaic (?): small number of tetradr.; poorly preserved Disposition: unknown Edgar, ASA 1906, p. 208 (no details)
